name: Dark Mode

issues.info: Create a new issue describing your problem in details

description: Changes hard-coded colors to a dark-mode-style theme with an option of customization. Inspired by Absolute's DarkMode Patcher for 2.1.

floating-settings-button.name: Floating settings button
floating-settings-button.description:
Set this to checked to display the button that pulls up these options from any screen, for quick color editing.

<cb>NOTE</c>: you will have to reopen or somehow refresh whatever thing's colors you're editing.
